attributes.action: Put more money into creating facilities for our younger generations to keep them off the streets
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I feel that not enough money is being put into solving the problem of youths on our streets. Increasingly more youths are finding nothing to do and instead wind up on the streets in gangs causing trouble and taking drugs and alcohol. I feel that if more facilities were provided then this would give children a decision. It seems in my area more money has been ploughed into shopping centres and taxes rather than tackelling problems.

rejection.details:
There are a number of petitions that have a similar theme: 
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/StateYouth/
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/youth-projects/
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/activeyoung/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
